meanings.definition: The quality or state of being heinous.
meanings.sent1: The heinousness of the crime shocked the entire community.
meanings.sent2: The heinousness of the villain's actions knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: The heinousness of the situation was so absurd, it felt like a bad movie plot.
meanings.sent4: The heinousness of the betrayal cut deeper than any knife.
meanings.sent5: The heinousness of the lie lingered in the air like a foul stench.

meanings.definition: The extreme wickedness or evilness of an act.
meanings.sent1: The heinousness of the crime was evident in the gruesome details.
meanings.sent2: The heinousness of the dictator's regime was known worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The heinousness of the prank was so over-the-top, it became legendary.
meanings.sent4: The heinousness of the storm's destruction left a trail of despair.
meanings.sent5: The heinousness of the injustice burned like a fire in the hearts of the oppressed.
